movie.title: Special Correspondents
movie.description_intro: A radio journalist and his technician get in over their heads when they hatch a scheme to fake their own kidnapping during a rebel uprising in South America and hide out in New York instead.
movie.description_full: A radio journalist and his technician get in over their heads when they hatch a scheme to fake their own kidnapping during a rebel uprising in South America and hide out in New York instead.

movies.title: Dark Matter
movies.summary: Liu Xing is a scholarship boy from China, newly arrived in Salt Lake City, a graduate student in cosmology, in Utah to study in Professor Reiser's prestigious program. Back in China, Liu Xing's parents are proud of him, and he dedicates himself to fulfilling their hopes. All the graduate students in the program work on projects that extend and further Reiser's model of the origins of the universe. Liu Xing does well until his own theories move him away from Reiser's. Will Reiser and the department recognize Liu Xing's brilliance? Can the young man's benefactor, Joanna Silver, intercede?
movies.description_full: Liu Xing is a scholarship boy from China, newly arrived in Salt Lake City, a graduate student in cosmology, in Utah to study in Professor Reiser's prestigious program. Will Reiser and the department recognize Liu Xing's brilliance? Can the young man's benefactor, Joanna Silver, intercede?

movies.title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
movies.title_english: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
movies.title_long: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot! (1967)
movies.summary: The Stranger, a half-breed bandit, is part of a band of thieves that steal a cargo of gold from a stagecoach. However, the Americans in the band betray him, and shoot all the Mexicans. The Stranger is not completely dead though, and crawls his way out of his shallow grave, continuing his pursuit of the gold, and exacting a bloody vengeance.

movies.title: Ride
movies.summary: A mother travels cross-country to California to be with her son after he decides to drop out of school and become a surfer.
movies.description_full: A mother travels cross-country to California to be with her son after he decides to drop out of school and become a surfer.
movies.synopsis: A mother travels cross-country to California to be with her son after he decides to drop out of school and become a surfer.

movies.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame 2: The Secret of the Bell
movies.title_english: The Hunchback of Notre Dame 2: The Secret of the Bell
movies.title_long: The Hunchback of Notre Dame 2: The Secret of the Bell (2002)
movies.summary: Now that Frollo is gone, Quasimodo rings the bell with the help of his new friend and Esmeralda's and Phoebus' little son, Zephyr. But when Quasi stops by a traveling circus owned by evil magician Sarousch, he falls for Madellaine, Sarouch's assistant. But greedy Sarousch forces Madellaine to help him steal the Cathedral's most famous bell.
